item.description:
Lets all go to City Sports Grille at Yankee Lanes for some comedy!

Tickets are only $10. and $1.00 for the meetup

Please arrive at 7:30pm so we can all meetup, sit together and have appetizers before the comedy show (show starts at 8:30).

The comedians that will be performing: George Hamm (Maine's Favorite Comedian) and two other great comedians with amazing backgrounds.

Comedian George Hamm is well known to Maine audiences as a frequent visitor to Portland's Comedy Connection. Hamm has performed his comedy routine across the U.S. including the Bellagio in Los Vegas, The Improv in Los Angeles, The Comedy Store and The Laugh Factory in Hollywood and Laugh Factory in Hawaii. This is going to be an amazing comedy show, one that you will not want to miss.

I hope to see you all there!!

p.s. I will be hosting the comedy show!
item.name: Appetizers & Comedy Night @ Yankee Lanes Portland in the City Sports Grille
